titleStmt.title: [Thy motto's lyke thy mind ...] J.D. Cambro- Britannus.
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.

notesStmt.note: Title from first of ten lines of untitled verse, which are located underneath engraving (by C. uan de Passe, the elder?) in honor of Sir Thomas Holland.
Place and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd. ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
